ArticleContent: (Purpose) This Act aims to protect the rights and interests of the people and contribute to improving the quality of life and strengthening national competitiveness by stipulating the basic matters necessary for the sound development of artificial intelligence and the establishment of a foundation for trust.
ArticleContentOriginal: (목적) 이 법은 인공지능의 건전한 발전과 신뢰 기반 조성에 필요한 기본적인 사항을 규정함으로써 국민의 권익과 존엄성을 보호하고 국민의 삶의 질 향상과 국가경쟁력을 강화하는 데 이바지함을 목적으로 한다.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “Artificial intelligence” refers to the electronic implementation of human intellectual abilities such as learning, reasoning, perception, judgment, and language comprehension.
ParagraphContentOriginal: “인공지능”이란 학습, 추론, 지각, 판단, 언어의 이해 등 인간이 가진 지적 능력을 전자적 방법으로 구현한 것을 말한다.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “Artificial intelligence system” refers to an artificial intelligence-based system that infers results such as predictions, recommendations, and decisions that affect real and virtual environments for a given goal with various levels of autonomy and adaptability.
ParagraphContentOriginal: “인공지능시스템”이란 다양한 수준의 자율성과 적응성을 가지고 주어진 목표를 위하여 실제 및 가상환경에 영향을 미치는 예측, 추천, 결정 등의 결과물을 추론하는 인공지능 기반 시스템을 말한다.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “Artificial intelligence technology” refers to hardware, software technology, or its utilization technology required to implement artificial intelligence.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “High-impact artificial intelligence” refers to an artificial intelligence system that may have a significant impact on or pose a risk to human life, physical safety, and fundamental rights, and is utilized in any of the following areas:
ItemContent: Supply of energy pursuant to Article 2, Paragraph 1 of the Energy Act

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “High-impact artificial intelligence” refers to an artificial intelligence system that may have a significant impact on or pose a risk to human life, physical safety, and fundamental rights, and is utilized in any of the following areas:
ItemContent: Production process of drinking water according to Article 3, Paragraph 1 of the Drinking Water Management Act

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “High-impact artificial intelligence” refers to an artificial intelligence system that may have a significant impact on or pose a risk to human life, physical safety, and fundamental rights, and is utilized in any of the following areas:
ItemContent: Establishment and operation of a system for providing and utilizing health care services pursuant to Article 3, Paragraph 1 of the Framework Act on Health and Medical Services
ItemContentOriginal: 「보건의료기본법」 제3조제1호에 따른 보건의료의 제공 및 이용체계의 구축ㆍ운영

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “High-impact artificial intelligence” refers to an artificial intelligence system that may have a significant impact on or pose a risk to human life, physical safety, and fundamental rights, and is utilized in any of the following areas:
ItemContent: Development and use of medical devices pursuant to Article 2, Paragraph 1 of the Medical Devices Act and digital medical devices pursuant to Article 2, Paragraph 2 of the Digital Medical Products Act.
ItemContentOriginal: 「의료기기법」 제2조제1항에 따른 의료기기 및 「디지털의료제품법」 제2조제2호에 따른 디지털의료기기의 개발 및 이용

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “High-impact artificial intelligence” refers to an artificial intelligence system that may have a significant impact on or pose a risk to human life, physical safety, and fundamental rights, and is utilized in any of the following areas:
ItemContent: Safe management and operation of nuclear materials as defined in Article 2, Paragraph 1, Item 1 of the Act on the Protection of Nuclear Facilities, etc. and Radiation Disaster Prevention and Control, and nuclear facilities as defined in Item 2 of the same Article.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “High-impact artificial intelligence” refers to an artificial intelligence system that may have a significant impact on or pose a risk to human life, physical safety, and fundamental rights, and is utilized in any of the following areas:
ItemContent: Analysis and utilization of biometric information (personal information pertaining to physical, physiological, and behavioral characteristics that can identify an individual, such as face, fingerprints, irises, and palm veins) for criminal investigations or arrests.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “High-impact artificial intelligence” refers to an artificial intelligence system that may have a significant impact on or pose a risk to human life, physical safety, and fundamental rights, and is utilized in any of the following areas:
ItemContent: Judgment or evaluation that has a significant impact on an individual's rights and obligations, such as hiring or loan screening.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “High-impact artificial intelligence” refers to an artificial intelligence system that may have a significant impact on or pose a risk to human life, physical safety, and fundamental rights, and is utilized in any of the following areas:
ItemContent: Major operations and management of transportation means, transportation facilities, and transportation systems pursuant to Article 2, Paragraphs 1 through 3 of the Traffic Safety Act.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “High-impact artificial intelligence” refers to an artificial intelligence system that may have a significant impact on or pose a risk to human life, physical safety, and fundamental rights, and is utilized in any of the following areas:
ItemContent: Decision-making by the state, local governments, public institutions under Article 4 of the Act on the Management of Public Institutions, etc. (hereinafter referred to as “state institutions, etc.”) that affect the public, such as verification and determination of qualifications necessary for the provision of public services or collection of fees.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “High-impact artificial intelligence” refers to an artificial intelligence system that may have a significant impact on or pose a risk to human life, physical safety, and fundamental rights, and is utilized in any of the following areas:
ItemContent: Tea. Student evaluation in early childhood education, elementary education, and secondary education pursuant to Article 9, Paragraph 1 of the Framework Act on Education.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “High-impact artificial intelligence” refers to an artificial intelligence system that may have a significant impact on or pose a risk to human life, physical safety, and fundamental rights, and is utilized in any of the following areas:
ItemContent: Ka. Other areas that have a significant impact on the safety of human life and body and the protection of basic rights, as determined by Presidential Decree.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “Generative artificial intelligence” refers to an artificial intelligence system that generates text, sounds, images, videos, and other various outputs by imitating the structure and characteristics of input data (data as defined in Article 2, Paragraph 1 of the Framework Act on Promotion of Data Industry and Utilization; hereinafter the same shall apply).

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “Artificial Intelligence Industry” refers to an industry that develops, manufactures, produces, or distributes products utilizing artificial intelligence or artificial intelligence technology (hereinafter referred to as “AI Products”) or provides services related thereto (hereinafter referred to as “AI Services”).

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “Artificial Intelligence Business Operator” refers to a corporation, organization, individual, or government agency that engages in business related to the artificial intelligence industry and falls under any of the following categories.
ItemContent: Artificial intelligence development business operator: A person who develops and provides artificial intelligence.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “Artificial Intelligence Business Operator” refers to a corporation, organization, individual, or government agency that engages in business related to the artificial intelligence industry and falls under any of the following categories.
ItemContent: Artificial Intelligence Utilization Business Operator: A person who provides artificial intelligence products or services using artificial intelligence provided by the business operator in Item A.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “User” refers to a person who receives artificial intelligence products or artificial intelligence services.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “Affected person” refers to a person whose life, physical safety, and fundamental rights are significantly affected by an artificial intelligence product or artificial intelligence service.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “Artificial Intelligence Society” refers to a society that creates value and drives development in all fields, including industry, economy, society, culture, and administration, through artificial intelligence.

ArticleContent: (Definitions) The terms used in this Act have the following meanings
ArticleContentOriginal: (정의) 이 법에서 사용하는 용어의 뜻은 다음과 같다.
ParagraphContent: “Artificial Intelligence Ethics” refers to the ethical standards that members of society must observe in all areas, including the development, provision, and use of artificial intelligence, in order to realize a safe and trustworthy artificial intelligence society that protects the rights, interests, lives, and property of citizens, based on respect for human dignity.
